Document.Focus: Febrile seizures - what to ask your doctor

Synonyms.Synonym: What to ask your doctor about febrile seizures

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Febrile seizures - what to ask your doctor ?
QAPair.Answer: Your child has had a febrile seizure . A simple febrile seizure stops by itself within a few seconds to a few minutes. It is most often followed by a brief period of drowsiness or confusion. The first febrile seizure is a frightening moment for parents. Below are some questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you take care of your child's febrile seizures.
